Enemies rarely see a shobhad sniper before the deadly blast of their powerful rifles snatches away the offender's life. Selected from among the most talented enforcers after proving themselves in combat, shobhad snipers learn how to cross the desert sands undetected, combine their powerful ranged weapons with close-combat techniques, and survive Akiton's freezing nights for weeks on end while scouting potential settlements or enemy strongholds. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 38 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 [Shobhad Sniper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1679) **Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 89 **Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Akitonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=94), [Shobhad](/Languages.aspx?ID=97) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +31, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +30, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +34, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +30 **Str** +6 **Dex** +9 **Con** +5 **Int** +2 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +2 **Items** _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shobhad longrifle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=251)_, _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441), _ _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_ --- **AC** 40 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +32 **Will** +26 **HP** 320 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**[Ferocity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=16)** --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** _fist_ +31 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 2d10+14 bludgeoning **Ranged** _longrifle_ +34 ([Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Kickback](/Traits.aspx?ID=409), [volley](/Traits.aspx?ID=201), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 3d8+9 bludgeoning; this includes the additional damage from kickback **Sniping Shot** The shobhad sniper makes a Strike with their longrifle, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to this Strike's attack roll and ignoring the target's [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4). **Sniper's Devastation** The shobhad sniper makes a fist Strike against a Medium or smaller creature. If this attack is successful, the shobhad sniper deals no damage, but they immediately [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) and throw their target up to 30 feet in a direction of their choice and then make a ranged Strike with their longrifle against the target, after which the target falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) in the designated location. As normal, the creature doesn't take any additional falling damage from the throw.
name: Shobhad Sniper
